frame_feature_extractor.downsize_frame(frame, target_size=256)¶

Downsizes an image to target_size on its longest axis

Parameters

  • frame (image) – a [1xhxwxc] image

  • target_size – a target length for the long side of the image

Returns

a [1xhxwxc] image tensor who’s longest size is target size

Return type

image
